mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(AVG(RE.RATING), -1) AS AVERAGE_RATING, -1 AS USER_RATING, GA.ID AS ID_GAME, GA.NAME AS NAME, GROUP_CONCAT(GE.NAME SEPARATOR ', ') AS GENRES FROM GAME GA LEFT JOIN REVIEW RE ON GA.ID = RE.ID_GAME, GENRE GE, GAME_GENRE GG WHERE GG.ID_GENRE = GE.ID AND GG.ID_GAME = GA.ID GROUP BY GA.NAME, USER_RATING, GA.ID ORDER BY GA.ID
mapper.delete: DELETE REVIEW WHERE ID_USER = #{idUser} AND ID_GAME = #{idGame}
mapper.select: SELECT US.NAME AS USER_NAME, RE.RATING, RE.REVIEW FROM REVIEW RE, USER US WHERE RE.ID_USER = US.ID AND ID_USER != #{idUser} AND ID_GAME = #{idGame}
